https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Abby and Ben dated previously but ended their relationship when Ben's football career got in the way. They unexpectedly reunite years later when visiting The Greenbrier around the holiday season, forcing the duo to figure out if true love is still a priority. Christmas at The Greenbrier
